variables.name: tg_base_name
variables.description: String: base name of created resources
variables.query: What base name would you like new resource names to be built from?

variables.name: create_resource_group
variables.description: Boolean: create the resource group or ingest existing.
variables.query: Switch: create a new resource group (true) or use an existing one (false)?

variables.name: existing_resource_group_name
variables.description: String: name of the existing resource group to ingest.
variables.query: Existing resource group - what is its name?

variables.name: create_law
variables.description: Boolean: create a log analytics workspace or not.
variables.query: Switch: create a new log analytics workspace (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: create_managed_identity
variables.description: Boolean: create a user defined managed identity or ingest existing.
variables.query: Switch: create a new user assigned managed identity (true) or use an existing one (false)?

variables.name: existing_managed_identity_name
variables.description: String: name of the existing managed identity to ingest.
variables.query: Existing managed identity - what is its name?

variables.name: existing_managed_identity_rg
variables.description: String: name of the resource group of the existing managed identity to ingest.
variables.query: Existing managed identity - what is the name of its resource group?

variables.name: create_acr
variables.description: Boolean: create an Azure Container Registry or not.
variables.query: Switch: create a new Azure Container Registry (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: create_kv
variables.description: Boolean: create a Key Vault or not.
variables.query: Switch: create a new Key Vault (true) or use an existing one (false)?

variables.name: make_created_kv_private
variables.description: Boolean: Make the created kv private by placing it behind a private endpoint.
variables.query: Switch: Make the created kv private by placing it behind a private endpoint (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: existing_kv_name
variables.description: String: if ingesting an existing KV, its name.
variables.query: Existing Key Vault - what is its name?

variables.name: existing_kv_rg_name
variables.description: String: if ingesting an existing KV, its resource group
variables.query: Existing Key Vault - what's the name of its resource group?

variables.name: create_platform_vpn
variables.description: Boolean: create an Azure VPN Gateway and its dependencies or not.
variables.query: Switch: create an Azure VPN Gateway (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: create_vnet
variables.description: Boolean: create a VNET or ingest existing.
variables.query: Switch: create a new Virtual Network (true) or use an existing one (false)?

variables.name: new_vnet_address_space
variables.description: String: if creating a new VNET, its address space represented as a CIDR.
variables.query: Creating a new Virtual Network - what's it's address space CIDR?

variables.name: existing_vnet_rg_name
variables.description: String: if ingesting an existing VNET, its resource group.
variables.query: Existing vnet - name of the resource group containing it?

variables.name: existing_vnet_name
variables.description: String: if ingesting an existing VNET, its name.
variables.query: Existing vnet - its name?

variables.name: peer_vnet_with_another
variables.description: Boolean: peer the vnet in this trust-group with another.
variables.query: Switch: peer vnet with another (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: create_well_known_subnets
variables.description: Boolean: create the well known subnets or ingest existing.
variables.query: Switch: create the well known subnets (true) or use existing (false)?

variables.name: include_openvpn_mods
variables.description: Boolean: Include OpenVPN network modifications.
variables.query: Switch: Add OpenVPN network modifications (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: openvpn_client_cidr
variables.description: String: Address space of new OpenVPN clients, expressed as a CIDR.
variables.query: Including an OpenVPN server - what's the client address space CIDR?

variables.name: openvpn_client_next_hop
variables.description: String: IP address of next hop for vpnToClient route.
variables.query: Including an OpenVPN server - what's the IP address of the server?

variables.name: openvpn_is_in_this_tg
variables.description: Boolean: OpenVPN server is in this trust-group?
variables.query: Switch: The OpenVPN server is in this trust-group (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: is_tfstate_home
variables.description: Boolean: create the tfstate storage.
variables.query: Switch: Create tfstate storage in this trust group (true) or not (false)?

variables.name: tfstate_storage_key
variables.description: String: Name of the tfstate storage blob.
variables.query: This trust group contains tfstate storage - what is the value of 'key' in the AzureRM backend configuration?
